pages.text: 40|34|Pes az in niz Jusuf ʙo daloili ravsan nazdaton omad, ammo sumo az on ci ʙarojaton ovarda ʙud, pajvasta dar sak ʙuded, to zamone, ki az dunjo raft [va ʙar tardidaton afzuda sud]. On goh gufted: «Alloh taolo hargiz pas az vaj pajomʙarero maʙ'us naxohad kard». Alloh taolo isrofkori ʙadgumonro in guna gumroh mesozad

40|35|Kasone, ki dar mavridi ojoti ilohi, ʙe on ki dalele dosta ʙosad, ʙa mucodala ʙarmexezad, [raftorason] nazdi Alloh taolo va mu'minin saxt nopisand ast. Alloh taolo in guna ʙar dili har mutakaʙʙiri xudkoma muhr [-i ƣaflat] mezanad
40|36|Fir'avn [ʙa vaziras] guft: «Ej Homon, ʙaroi man ʙinoi ʙalande ʙisoz, sojad ʙa rohhoe ʙirasam

40|37|Rohhoe dar osmonho [ki maro to Arsi ilohi ʙiʙarad], to ʙa ma'ʙudi Muso ʙingaram [va az U ogoh savam], harcand, man qat'an uro duruƣgu mepindoram». Bad-in son zistii kirdori Fir'avn [dar nazars] orosta gast va az roh [-i haq] ʙozmond va najrangi Fir'avn ʙa zijon va taʙohi ancomid
40|38|On mardi mu'min guft: «Ej qavmi man, az man pajravi kuned, to sumoro ʙa rohi rost hidojat kunam
40|39|Ej qavmi man, in zindagii dunjo ʙahrae [andak va zudguzar] ast va oxirat saroi covidon ast
40|40|Har ki kori ʙade murtakiʙ savad, ʙa tanosuʙi on kajfar xohad did va mardon va zanoni mu'min va nekukor ʙa ʙihist vorid mesavand va dar on co az ne'mati ʙesumor ʙarxurdor xohand sud
